controller

Class WallController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.WallController

  • public class WallController
extends java.lang.Object
    WallController class is responsible for all the implementations on the wall,ball and the impacts.

    • Method Detail

      • makeBall

        private void makeBall(java.awt.geom.Point2D ballPos)
        makeBall is a Private Method that calls the RubberBall Constructor to make the rubber ball. Composition relationship
        Parameters:
        ballPos - the initial location of the ball.

      • move

        public void move()
        move Method calls the move methods in the Player and BallController classes.

      • findImpacts

        public void findImpacts()
        findImpacts Method is responsible for implementing all ball and brick properties when impact is made. Implements when ball makes impact with the player. Implements when ball makes impact with the wall. Calls the impactWall() method. Implements when ball makes impact with the game frame/border.

      • impactWall

        private boolean impactWall()
        impactWall is a Private Method that is responsible for when the ball makes impact with the wall.
        Returns:
        returns a boolean value to denote if ball made impact with wall or not.

      • impactBorder

        private boolean impactBorder()
        impactBorder is a Private Method that carries out the implementation for when the ball makes impact with game border.
        Returns:
        returns a boolean value to denote if ball made impact with the border or not.

      • wallReset

        public void wallReset()
        wallReset method resets the wall. Repairs all bricks. Resets ball and brick count.

      • ballEnd

        public boolean ballEnd()
        ballEnd() method checks if the all the balls have been used up.
        Returns:
        returns a boolean value based on the ballCount value. true if the ballCount is zero. false otherwise.
